name: test_e2e_with_logs[227_CMD_NEST_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_NEST_003` |
| **Name** | Triple nested substitution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | nested_substitution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `$($($(echo cat) /etc/passwd))`
- **Encoded**: `%24(%24(%24(echo%20cat)%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd))`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:40:05.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=CMD_NEST_003-1767850805119-1fwiya pattern_id=CMD_NEST_003 uri=/?q=%24(%24(%24(echo%20cat)%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd)) client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
05:40:05.000000000: Critical [NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=CMD_NEST_003-1767850805119-1fwiya pattern_id=CMD_NEST_003 uri=/?q=%24(%24(%24(echo%20cat)%20%2Fetc%2Fpasswd)) client=127.0.0.1
```
